Name: Yet Another Hero Legend 英雄传说又一则
About the game: Heroes, Justice, Collecting Flags, Sokoban, and the Extermination of Evil, Yet Another Hero Legend is a minimalistic puzzle game filled with choices and creative solutions. Countless heroes emerged during the war. Yet it was him who took the final blow against the Evil Lord. It was him who slashed off the Evil Lord’s head with his beloved sword. Thus the war ends, and our story begins, as our victorious hero returns to the human kingdom. * 20 carefully crafted puzzles * 8 extra puzzles for the adventurous after completion of the main story * Level editor capable of exporting as files or copyable text * Original pixel art and 8-bit soundtrack
